item.title: JDK - No Install Needed
item.description: I don't like the whole concept of installers for my development tools like JDK, Eclipse, Netbeans, etc. I just keep a batch/shell script to setup my environment variables for JAVA_HOME, PATH and aliases.

item.title: Google App Engine & Maven - Works For Me
item.description: Google has released its App Engine SDK on Maven central as a zip. But its very large and causes a "Error 503 backend read error".
